New Records: Emilio Nsue scored his second hat-trick in international football
Key Match Events: Equatorial Guinea's comeback after trailing, VAR overturning a decision, injury-time goal celebration
Pre-Game Insights: The match was seen as a duel to avoid last place before the tournament
Post-Match Reflections: The victory lifted Equatorial Guinea's standing in Group A
Miscellaneous Highlights: Group standings in AFCON 2023 Group A
